channel.title: [667] Npc Spawn
channel.description: My 667 has no packedSpawns or UnpackedSpawns in data/npcs nor does it have packedShops etc... IS there anyway to add these? It has a shop editor and stuff and I can add/edit items, but I can't move the shops. I Changed the coords of the shops in npcspawns.txt and npc.java, but it dosnt save because it's not being packed... Any solution?

item.title: [667] Npc Spawn
item.dc:creator: @miller4 miller4
item.description:
@miller4 wrote:

My 667 has no packedSpawns or UnpackedSpawns in data/npcs nor does it have packedShops etc… IS there anyway to add these? It has a shop editor and stuff and I can add/edit items, but I can’t move the shops. I Changed the coords of the shops in npcspawns.txt and npc.java, but it dosnt save because it’s not being packed… Any solution?
